name: Figure Blind Box
description: Collectable figure blind boxes with exclusive XP rarity cards.
notes: ONLY source of XP rarity cards. Each box: 1 blind figure + 1 XP card (~$10). 86 figures total: 57 regular, 24 eternal, 1 ultimate, 1 big, 3 small chase. 12-pack: 10 regular + 1 eternal + 1 chase guaranteed. Separate figure collection tracking required.
